body:
Hey guys, so I basically am giving my channel a big update (you can watch that video here), and I really need someone to be able to make me a new channel art (NOT logo).

I don't want anything too complicated; all I want is:
- My name
- Twitter (symbol + URL)
- Some cool looking background (NOT MINECRAFT STYLE)

Anyways those are pretty much the only things I want on it, and I'll discuss more on Skype if you're able to do it for me.

Oh also, if you know anyone who can do it for free, let me know and if they're not on Avicus, I'll pay YOU the credits because of the reference.

Thanks!

title: Need Channel Art (PRIZE 5k CREDITS+SHOUTOUT)
